parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. While Dumitru Flucus is a politician and a member of AUR, the post focuses on a religious event, the commemoration of Father Arsenie Boca, and does not mention his political activity or campaign.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content is intended to reach a wide audience, not just a specific individual or small group.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The primary objective of the post is not to influence the vote in the parliamentary elections.  The content centers on a religious event and expresses personal sentiments regarding Father Arsenie Boca. There is no explicit or implicit call to vote for or against any candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post could be considered a form of personal communication or a personal account of an event, it does not adhere to journalistic standards. It lacks objectivity and focuses on personal feelings and beliefs.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>True. The post expresses a personal opinion and recounts a personal experience at a religious event.  It does not advocate for or against any political candidate or party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2779144615601838</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while made by a politician, does not constitute electoral propaganda.  The content focuses on a religious event and personal reflections, not on influencing voters in the parliamentary elections.  There is no mention of any candidate or party, nor any call to action related to voting. The fact that it's a paid post doesn't automatically make it electoral propaganda; the content itself must meet the criteria defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  This post does not meet those criteria.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
